definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: These are available at most hardware and home improvement stores.
sentences.chinese: 这些产品大多都可以在五金店和家用品店里买得到。

sentences.english: I bought a steel tape and a tap in the hardware store.
sentences.chinese: 我在五金店买了一个钢卷尺和一只水龙头。

sentences.english: His work was fraught with problems and he had to make frequent trips to the hardware store.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作老有问题，他得常跑五金店。

sentences.english: They ran a hardware store weekdays.
sentences.chinese: 他们在工作日里经营着一个五金店。

sentences.english: He bought a flat file from the hardware store.
In the hardware store, he found a paraffin stove, and took it home with a tin of fuel.
sentences.chinese: 在五金店他找到一个煤油炉，拿了一桶油带回家来。

sentences.english: Mr. Harper bought out a nearby hardware store.
sentences.chinese: 哈珀先生盘进附近一家五金店的全部货底。

sentences.english: If you're not adept at household tasks, take a "do-it-yourself" course at your local hardware store.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不善于做家务，可以在五金店里自己琢磨琢磨。

sentences.english: Three buildings in town were over-run by squirrels—the town hall, the hardware store, and the church.
sentences.chinese: 镇里的政厅，五金店和教堂这三幢深受松鼠侵扰。

sentences.english: The hardware store humanely trapped the squirrels and set them free outside town.
sentences.chinese: 五金店捕捉到松鼠后，施与怜悯将它们在镇外释放了。

sentences.english: Start hanging out at the local hardware or home improvement store.
sentences.chinese: 现在开始出没于本地的五金店和家装用品店吧。

sentences.english: You can buy a professional lock pick set at a hardware store.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在五金店购买一套专业的开锁工具。

sentences.english: Farther down the road is the Fu Zhong hardware and furniture wholesaler.
sentences.chinese: 一路下去，还能看到福中五金店和家具批发商。

sentences.english: He relishes running into people at the local hardware store whom he has helped in the past.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢在当地五金店碰到以前的客户。

sentences.english: Many clean up supplies are available from hardware stores.
sentences.chinese: 很多清理用品都可以从五金店买到。

definition: kiosk/snack counter/retail department or section inside a larger business
retail department/section of a retail store
supermarket/abbr. for 超級市場|超级市场/CL:家[jia1]
